EmailTemplate.name: Certification-Notification On Admin Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification To The Candidate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c},
Congratulations! You have successfully completed all requirements to achieve certification as a '{!Qualification__c.Certified_In_Area__c}'. You will receive another email with the agreement. Please review and sign the agreement to finalize the certification. Thank you.
